The <S%H5288>servant<s%> who was <S%H5324>set<s%> over the <S%H7114>reapers<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"It<s%> is the <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> <S%H5291>lady<s%> who came <S%H7725>back<s%> with <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> out of the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

So she <S%H3950>gleaned<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> until <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and she beat <S%H2251>out<s%> that which she had <S%H3950>gleaned,<s%> and it was about an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H8184>barley.<s%>

<S%H7327>the<s%> <S%H4125>Moabitess<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H559>"Yes,<s%> he said to <S%H1692>me,<s%> 'You shall stay close to my young <S%H5288>men,<s%> until they have <S%H3615>ended<s%> all my <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>'"
